attributes.action: Scrap airport taxes on staff airline tickets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many airline crew based all over the world are paying huge amounts of extra money for their tickets due to taxes that have been introduced. I would ask you to consider abolishing the tax for aircrew who use air travel as as means of getting to and from there place of work. Many airlines have reduced salaries and these extra charges are a huge portion or their salaries.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap airport taxes on staff airline tickets."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16924


Prime Minister's Office
